answers.answer: Talk to your doc about this. Bile is the substance that colors the stool. It's put out as yellowy-green, but as it's acted on by digestion it slowly turns brown. Without the bile, the fecal material would be gray or whitish. So the stools you're having sound like they're not being mixed with bile, or somehow the bile isn't being released into the duodenum. It can be caused by a variety of issues including stones.
